5 Best Rated George Foreman Grills In July 2018

November 21, 2018April 4, 2018 by Jack Thompson
15shares
  • Facebook2
  • Pinterest13
  • Twitter
  • Google+

Grilling is one of the best ways to cook your food and share it with friends and family but cooking with a charcoal or gas grill is not an option for many people as these types can be messy and difficult to use on some levels. This is where the best George Foreman grills come to play.

A George Foreman type grill could be a convenient solution for people who cannot or do not want to use a traditional charcoal or gas grill. These give you the benefits of a traditional unit, while some also offer much more in the way of convenience and versatility.

If youve been considering an affordable option for your home, to be used outdoors as well as indoors, then take a look at this list weve prepared.

Here we have the George Foreman Grills for 2018.

Reviews of the Best George Foreman Grills for 2018

1. George Foreman GGR50B Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill

The unit blends convenience with function. Set up is fairly easy, and the build is very sturdy.

It is also a George Foreman grill with removable plates, a grease tray, a domed lid with an adjustable vent, a power cord which includes the temperature control and a stand.

The stand is made out of plastic and aluminum and the stabilizing legs all clip together, so you wont need any tools when putting it together. Since the stand is removable, youll be able to take it from the backyard to the countertop in no time.

The grill plate has a non-stick coating, called the George Tough Coating. Its durable, easy to clean and lets you cook without using butter or oil.

With five individual heat settings of the model, you can cook using slow heat all the way up to being able to using searing temperatures.

The temperature control will surely be a familiar experience if youve used gas grills in the past and a new experience that youre likely to welcome if youve only used charcoal grills. Whatever you want to cook, youll be able to easily adjust the temperature for it.

Thanks to the electronic controls, heat is perfectly maintained and the unit has the ability to self-regulate by turning the heating element on or off. You dont even have to think about it, just set the temperature and let it do what it has to do.

Youll also get the versatility of outdoor and indoor grilling. You can use it outside with the included stand or put on your counter, a picnic table or another heat-resistant surface. It wont be a problem, since it has feet at the bottom. Of course, you can also use it inside with the stand.

The construction itself is also built with two materials, just like the stand. The quality of the materials is appropriate for the price range, but that is not to say that they are of bad or cheap quality.

Aluminum is used for the cooking surface and the lid. The cooking surface is coated in high quality Teflon, which is scratch resistant when used with wooden or plastic utensils.

All in all, the build is rather good, making it a top rated George Foreman grill.

Pros

  • Easy to assembly
  • Sturdy construction
  • Can be used indoors and outdoors
  • Easy to clean up

Cons

  • Power cord should have been a few feet longer
  • A little too lightweight
Check Price on Amazon

2. George Foreman GFO201R Indoor/Outdoor Electric Grill

This one is very easy to set up, so if youre buying online, that should not be one of your concerns. The whole thing takes about thirty minutes to put together and all the tools you will need is a Phillips head screwdriver.

The first thing youll notice when getting the unit out of the box is its high quality and unique design. This particular model is meant for both indoor and outdoor use, so youll have the freedom and versatility to cook how you want to cook.

There is another feature of the design: the cooking surface is sloped, which allows for the fat to drip into a collection tray while youre cooking the food. This means that your food will have close to half the amount of fat it would have if it had been cooked on an ordinary cooking surface.

Youll also be able to achieve searing temperatures with this grill, so your food will not be left without moisture.

This one surely looks and feels like a high quality appliance. We wont say that its not, but in the price range this grill is found, compromises are inevitable. Although for the price, you will not be disappointed.

The one negative thing that can be said about its construction is that the stand, being made of plastic, is not as heavy as it could be. There is the possibility of it not being able to withstand very strong winds. But its still stable in most conditions.

The cooking surface is perfectly coated in Teflon. Its very well put together, so you dont have to worry about this grill falling apart even after years of use.

Pros

  • Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
  • Easy assembly

Cons

  • The stand could be a little heavier
Check Price on Amazon

3. George Foreman GRP4EMB Multi-Plate Evolve Grill

The unit aims to take care not only of your grilling needs, but you can also use it to deep-dish bake or even cook muffins. Its affordable, versatile and easy to use.

The model has an attractive design with high quality metals and plastics. The cooking plates are solid but not too heavy that are attached easily, so that you wont have to waste any time setting it up.

Aside from the high quality construction, an obvious benefit of the unit is that youll be able to use it not just for grilling. With the interchangeable plates, youll be able to cook different kinds of foods.

The standard grill plate is just as good as you would expect and its slanted so that the fat drips onto the dripping tray. The result of this design creates food cooked with far less fat.

Its perfect if youre on a low fat diet. You can cook a steak perfectly with little fat and while retaining all of its moisture.

With the deep dish tray, you can cook bread, pizza, vegetables or just about anything you want to put in there. The cupcake and muffin tray looks just like a regular tray of its kind, but its been designed to fit the grill.

The grilling process is simple. There isnt a lot of mess thanks to the dripping tray and its very easy to clean up.

The removable cooking plates can be put in the dishwasher, which is something you probably wont have to do every time, since you can just use paper towels to clean this up.

The unit reaches full temperature in about five minutes and it will maintain whatever temperature you select. There is also a timer included, so you can ensure perfect cooking times.

But the deep dish tray is probably the star of the show for the Evolve. This is the most versatile accessory and you can do practically anything on it from scrambled eggs to toasted sandwiches.

You do have to be careful with the amount you pour into the deep dish tray. If you put too much in there, it might overflow and create a bit of a mess.

The cooking trays and release handles feel sturdy, which is important because the whole idea is that youll be switching those out very often. In case of any problems, the tray accessories can be purchased separately and you can get additional ones.

Pros

  • High quality sturdy construction
  • Interchangeable plates
  • Includes a thermometer

Cons

  • Oiling is sometimes needed on the plates
  • Clean up can be messy if it overflows
Check Price on Amazon

4. George Foreman GRP90WGR Next Grilleration Electric Nonstick Grill

This is another great model with removable plates. Although a little smaller than the previous one, this one also offers lots of versatility.

You get five removable grill plates: two grill plates, two waffle plates and a griddle or deep dish tray. Youll have no need to buy any other accessories, they already come with the unit.

So youll be able to have waffles for breakfast, Paninis for lunch and steak for dinner by cooking them all on the same appliance.

The unit can be easily cleaned without even using the dishwasher, thanks to its detachable plates. Just be a little careful to ensure that you dont end up damaging the nonstick surface while cleaning the countertop grill.

Another good thing about the model is that it has a temperature control knob which you no longer need to unplug the appliance to turn it off. Although its only marked 1, 2 and 3, which is equivalent to low, medium and high, its better than nothing.

This grill is definitely worth it if youre looking for something easy to use that offers the versatility of interchangeable plates and temperature control.

Pros

  • Plenty of interchangeable plates
  • Dishwasher-safe plates
  • Temperature control

Cons

  • The top grill plate might be a little harder to clean because of its pattern
Check Price on Amazon

5. George Foreman GRP1060B 4 Serving Removable Plate Grill

This is a small, ultra-light table-top unit that can cook up to four servings, so its definitely not for grill parties or gatherings.

However, its small size does not necessarily make it less powerful. In fact, the build quality and the material of the plates are of the superior variety.

The plates on the equipment are also removable, although this is only for the convenience of cleaning them in the dishwasher. It does not come with plates other than the ones for regular grilling.

The plates are non-stick, so you wont need butter or oil when cooking and they are durable enough to resist constant use or constant cleaning.

Another great feature of this model is that it heats up fast allowing you to expect your food to be ready in about ten minutes.

Go for this one if you are a beginner in the field and want to cook up small meals initially.

Pros

  • Removable, dishwasher safe plates
  • Heats up fast

Cons

  • No temperature control
  • Short power cord
Check Price on Amazon

What Should Be Your Pick?

What is the Best George Foreman Grill for 2018? With so many options, its really hard to tell. If youre looking for one that you can as a backyard grill as well as on the tabletop, then we say go with the GGR50B Indoor/Outdoor Grill.

It offers great value for the money and the only real disadvantage is that part of its construction is plastic. You can even choose it if you want to replace a charcoal or a gas one.

But if youre looking for something that is a little bit more than a grill, then we say choose the Multi-Plate Evolve model. Its one of the most versatile models which is also easy to use and you will not be limiting yourself to just grilling. Youll be able to cook different types of food, although in relatively small amounts.

Why Should You Invest on a George Foreman Grill?


There are benefits to having and using an electric grill like the George Foreman type grills. In some cases, it can even replace a conventional gas or charcoal grill.

Availability of Fuel Does Not Affect the Operation

One of the biggest benefits is that, as long as there is electricity, you never have to worry about fuel and youll never have difficulty lighting up your grill. The weather will not be a problem for you either.

Comes with Fat Reducing Feature

A striking aspect of the George Foreman grills is their ability to drain out the fat from the food item, which is the main reason why they are popularly referred to as the George Foreman Lean Mean Fat-Reducing Grilling Machine.

A Lot More Energy Efficient

Electric grills are also energy-efficient as you only need to have it on for the amount of time that youll be using it. Theres no waiting a long time for the equipment to reach the desired temperature and there are no long cool down periods afterwards.

Easy to Clean

Ease of cleaning is another benefit. The George Foreman grills are designed to be easy to clean, and include non-stick coating to allow you to clean the grates with a towel even before they have completely cooled down.

In some models, the grilling plates can be thrown in the dishwasher too.
